info.title: Orchestration Service
info.description: Service that can power non-custodial staking experiences for your users.

400.description: The request attempted has invalid parameters

401.description: Returned if authentication information is invalid

403.description: Returned when a user does not have permission to the resource.

404.description: Returned when a resource is not found.

429.description: Returned when a resource limit has been reached.

500.description: Returned when an internal server error happens.

parameters.name: parent
pageSize
parameters.description:
The maximum number of staking targets to return. The service may
return fewer than this value.

If unspecified, 100 staking targets will be returned.
The maximum value is 1000; values over 1000 will be floored to 1000.

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description:
A page token as part of the response of a previous call.
Provide this to retrieve the next page.

When paginating, all other parameters must match the previous
request to list resources.

filter
parameters.description:
[AIP-160](https://google.aip.dev/160) filter
Supported fields:
- string action: "stake", "unstake"
- string protocol: "ethereum_kiln"
- string network: "holesky", "mainnet"

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description:
The maximum number of workflows to return. The service may
return fewer than this value.

If unspecified, 100 workflows will be returned.
The maximum value is 1000; values over 1000 will be floored to 1000.

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description:
A page token as part of the response of a previous call.
Provide this to retrieve the next page.

When paginating, all other parameters must match the previous
request to list resources.

StakeAccountBalanceState.description:
Represents the different states a stake account balance can have.
Used to check to see if stake is actively earning rewards or ready to be withdrawn.

 - BALANCE_STATE_UNSPECIFIED: The balance is not known.
 - BALANCE_STATE_INACTIVE: The balance is not actively staking.
 - BALANCE_STATE_ACTIVATING: The balance is in a warm up period and will activate in the next epoch.
 - BALANCE_STATE_ACTIVE: The balance is actively staking and earning rewards.
 - BALANCE_STATE_DEACTIVATING: The balance is in a cool down period and will be deactivated in the next epoch.

step.description: The index of the step to be performed.

data.description: Transaction metadata. This is either the signed transaction or transaction hash depending on the workflow's broadcast method.

WaitStepOutputWaitUnit.description:
The unit of wait time.

 - WAIT_UNIT_UNSPECIFIED: Unspecified wait time.
 - WAIT_UNIT_SECONDS: Wait time measured in seconds.
 - WAIT_UNIT_BLOCKS: Wait time measured in blocks.
 - WAIT_UNIT_EPOCHS: Wait time measured in epochs.
 - WAIT_UNIT_CHECKPOINTS: Wait time measured in checkpoints.

v1Action.description: An Action resource represents an action you may take on a network (e.g. stake, unstake).

value.description: The total value of the token.

v1Amount.description:
The amount of a token you wish to perform an action
with.

address.description: The contract address you may submit actions to.

v1Contract.description:
A Contract resource, which represents an active contract
for the given protocol network which you can submit an action
to.

stakerAddress.description: The address you wish to claim stake for.

integratorContractAddress.title: The address of the integrator contract

v1EthereumKilnClaimStakeParameters.description: The parameters required for the claim stake action on Ethereum Kiln.
v1EthereumKilnClaimStakeParameters.title: EthereumKiln: Claim Stake Parameters

stakerAddress.description: The address you wish to stake from.

integratorContractAddress.description: The address of the integrator contract.

amount.description: The amount of Ethereum to stake in wei.

v1EthereumKilnStakeParameters.description: The parameters required for the stake action on Ethereum Kiln.
v1EthereumKilnStakeParameters.title: EthereumKiln: Stake Parameters

ethereumBalance.description:
The Ethereum balance of the address.
This can be used to gate the stake action to make sure the requested stake amount
is less than ethereum_balance.

integratorShareBalance.description: The number of integrator shares owned by the address.

integratorShareUnderlyingBalance.title:
The total Ethereum you can exchange for your integrator shares.
This can be used to gate the unstake action to make sure the requested unstake amount
is less than integrator_share_underlying_balance

totalExitableEth.description:
The total amount of Ethereum you can redeem for all non-claimed vPool shares.
This along with the condition total_shares_pending_exit == fulfillable_share_count
can be used to gate the claim_stake action.

totalSharesPendingExit.description: The number of vPool shares are eligible to receive now or at a later point in time.

fulfillableShareCount.description: The number of vPool shares you are able to claim now.

v1EthereumKilnStakingContextDetails.description: The protocol specific details for an Ethereum Kiln staking context.
v1EthereumKilnStakingContextDetails.title: EthereumKiln: Staking context details

v1EthereumKilnStakingContextParameters.description: The protocol specific parameters required for fetching a staking context.
v1EthereumKilnStakingContextParameters.title: EthereumKiln: Staking Context Parameters

stakeParameters.description: The parameters for stake action on Ethereum Kiln.

unstakeParameters.description: The parameters for unstake action on Ethereum Kiln.

claimStakeParameters.description: The parameters for claim stake action on Ethereum Kiln.

v1EthereumKilnStakingParameters.description: The parameters needed for staking on Ethereum via Kiln.
v1EthereumKilnStakingParameters.title: EthereumKiln: Staking Parameters

stakerAddress.description: The address you wish to unstake from.

integratorContractAddress.description: The address of the integrator contract.

amount.description: The amount of Ethereum to unstake in wei.

v1EthereumKilnUnstakeParameters.description: The parameters required for the unstake action on Ethereum Kiln.
v1EthereumKilnUnstakeParameters.title: EthereumKiln: Unstake Parameters

withdrawalAddress.title: Ethereum address used to withdrawal funds

feeRecipient.title: Ethereum address used to accumulate fees

amount.title: Amount of ETH to stake in increments of 32

nextPageToken.description:
A token which can be provided as `page_token` to retrieve the next page.
If this field is omitted, there are no additional pages.

A token which can be provided as `page_token` to retrieve the next page.
If this field is omitted, there are no additional pages.

v1Network.description: A Network resource represents a blockchain network e.g. mainnet, testnet, etc.

computeUnitLimit.description: The maximum number of compute units a transaction is allowed to consume.

unitPrice.description: The price to pay per compute unit.

v1PriorityFee.description: A prioritization fee that can be added to a Solana transaction.

v1Protocol.description: A Protocol resource (e.g. ethereum_kiln, solana etc.).

state.description: The state of the provision infra step.

v1ProvisionInfraStepOutput.description: The details for an infrastructure provision request.

v1ProvisionInfraStepOutputState.description:
State defines an enumeration of states for provisioning infra.

 - STATE_UNSPECIFIED: Unspecified step state.
 - STATE_IN_PROGRESS: Provision step is in-progress.
 - STATE_COMPLETED: Provision step completed.
 - STATE_FAILED: Provision step failed.

walletAddress.description: The address which is the signing authority to claim stake.

stakeAccountAddress.description: The address of the stake account to claim stake from.

priorityFee.description: The option to set a priority fee for the transaction.

v1SolanaClaimStakeParameters.description: The parameters required to perform a claim stake operation on Solana.
v1SolanaClaimStakeParameters.title: Solana: Claim Stake Parameters

walletAddress.description: The address where the funds are coming from to stake.

amount.title: The amount of Solana to stake in lamports. (1 lamport = 0.000000001 SOL)

priorityFee.description: The option to set a priority fee for the transaction.

v1SolanaStakeParameters.description: The parameters required to perform a stake operation on Solana.
v1SolanaStakeParameters.title: Solana: Stake Parameters

balance.description:
The total balance of the main wallet address (system account).
Used to check the balance for any future staking or transaction to send.

currentEpoch.description:
The current epoch that the Solana blockchain is in.
Used as a frame of reference for future stake activations and deactivations.

epochCompletionPercentage.description:
How much of the epoch has passed as a percentage.
Used to inform how much time is left before a stake is activated or deactivated.

stakeAccounts.description:
The list of staking accounts that are linked to the main wallet address (system account).
Used to check for statuses and balances of all stake accounts related to the main wallet address that
they're linked to.

v1SolanaStakingContextDetails.description: The protocol specific details for a Solana staking context.
v1SolanaStakingContextDetails.title: Solana: Staking Context Details

v1SolanaStakingContextParameters.description: The protocol specific parameters required for fetching a staking context.
v1SolanaStakingContextParameters.title: Solana: Staking Context Parameters

stakeParameters.description: The parameters for stake action on Solana.

unstakeParameters.description: The parameters for unstake action on Solana.

claimStakeParameters.description: The parameters for claim stake action on Solana.

v1SolanaStakingParameters.description: The parameters needed for staking on Solana.
v1SolanaStakingParameters.title: Solana: Staking Parameters

walletAddress.description: The address which is the signing authority to unstake.

stakeAccountAddress.description: The address of the stake account to unstake from.

amount.title: The amount of Solana to unstake in lamports. (1 lamport = 0.000000001 SOL)

priorityFee.description: The option to set a priority fee for the transaction.

v1SolanaUnstakeParameters.description: The parameters required to perform a unstake operation on Solana.
v1SolanaUnstakeParameters.title: Solana: Unstake Parameters

address.description:
The address of the stake account.
Used to hold the staked funds transferred over from the main wallet.

bondedStake.description:
The bonded balance in lamports on the stake account (rent is not included in bonded amount).
Used to check the amount that is currently staked.

rentReserve.description:
The rent amount for the stake account in lamports.
Used to highlight the amount used as the rent to maintain the address on the Solana blockchain.

balance.description:
The total balance on the address in lamports.
Used to check the total balance for the stake account.

balanceState.description:
The balance state of the stake account.
Used to show what state the currently staked funds are in.

validator.description:
The validator (vote account) that the stake account is assigned to stake to.
Used to show where the staked funds are staked to.

v1StakeAccount.description: The balance information for a stake account.

contract.description: A contract to send a staking action to.

v1StakingTarget.description: A Staking Target represents a destination that you perform an action on related to staking.

unsignedTx.description: The unsigned transaction which was signed in order to be broadcasted.

signedTx.description: The signed transaction which was asked to be broadcasted.

txHash.description: The hash of the broadcasted transaction.

state.description: The state of the transaction step.

errorMessage.description: The error message if the transaction step failed.

v1TxStepOutput.description: The details of a transaction being constructed and broadcasted to the network.

v1TxStepOutputState.description:
State defines an enumeration of states for a staking transaction.

 - STATE_UNSPECIFIED: Unspecified transaction state, this is for backwards compatibility.
 - STATE_NOT_CONSTRUCTED: Tx has not yet been constructed in the backend.
 - STATE_CONSTRUCTED: Tx construction is over in the backend.
 - STATE_PENDING_EXT_BROADCAST: Tx is waiting to be externally broadcasted by the customer.
 - STATE_SIGNED: Tx has been signed and returned to the backend.
 - STATE_BROADCASTING: Tx is being broadcasted to the network.
 - STATE_CONFIRMING: Tx is waiting for confirmation.
 - STATE_CONFIRMED: Tx has been confirmed to be included in a block.
 - STATE_FINALIZED: Tx has been finalized.
 - STATE_FAILED: Tx construction or broadcasting failed.
 - STATE_SUCCESS: Tx has been successfully executed.

address.description: The public address of the validator.

commissionRate.title: The rate of commission for the validator

v1Validator.description: A Validator resource represents an active validator for the given protocol network.

address.description: The address you are getting a staking context for.

v1ViewStakingContextResponse.description: The response message for the ViewStakingContext request.

unit.description: The wait unit (like checkpoint, block, epoch etc).

state.description: The state of the wait step.

v1WaitStepOutput.description: The output details of a step where we wait for some kind of on-chain activity to finish like reaching a certain checkpoint, epoch or block.

v1WaitStepOutputState.description:
WaitStepState defines an enumeration of states for a wait step.

 - STATE_UNSPECIFIED: Unspecified wait step state.
 - STATE_NOT_STARTED: Wait step has not started.
 - STATE_IN_PROGRESS: Wait step is in-progress.
 - STATE_COMPLETED: Wait step completed.

state.description: The current state of the workflow.

currentStepId.description: The index of the current step.

steps.description: The list of steps for this workflow.

createTime.description: The timestamp the workflow was created.

updateTime.description: The timestamp the workflow was last updated.

v1WorkflowState.description:
Example flows:
 A workflow leading to a successful completion.
 IN_PROGRESS -> WAITING_FOR_EXT_BROADCAST -> IN_PROGRESS -> COMPLETED
 A workflow leading to a failure.
 IN_PROGRESS -> WAITING_FOR_EXT_BROADCAST -> IN_PROGRESS -> FAILED

 - STATE_UNSPECIFIED: Unspecified workflow state, this is for backwards compatibility.
 - STATE_IN_PROGRESS: In Progress represents a workflow that is currently in progress.
 - STATE_WAITING_FOR_EXT_BROADCAST: Waiting for external broadcast represents the workflow is waiting for the customer to broadcast a tx and return its corresponding tx hash.
 - STATE_COMPLETED: Completed represents the workflow has completed.
 - STATE_FAILED: Failed represents the workflow has failed.
v1WorkflowState.title: The state of a workflow

name.description: The human readable name of the step.

txStepOutput.description: The tx step output (e.g. transaction metadata such as unsigned tx, signed tx etc).

waitStepOutput.description: The waiting details for any kind like how many checkpoints away for unbonding etc.

v1WorkflowStep.description: The information for a step in the workflow.
v1WorkflowStep.title: The information for a step in the workflow
